title: ME60055: Quality Control And Reliability - Quick Facts

Previous Year Grade Distribution

Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Quality Control and ReliabilityQuality planning, analysis and control. Process modelling for on-line and off-line quality control. Quality parameter design Taguchi method - Orthogonal arrays. Robust design - noise factors, testing conditions, quality characteristics, identification of control factors, System optimization. Quality audit. Fundamental aspects of reliability, Reliability testing and evaluation. Failure patterns and mathematical models. Role of manufacturing processes in controlling reliability. Role of design in achieving reliability goals. Systems approach to reliability integration.
